keel.Algorithms.Preprocess.Feature_Selection.evolutionary_algorithms

Class Cromosoma

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Preprocess.Feature_Selection.evolutionary_algorithms.Cromosoma
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CromosomaBinario, CromosomaEntero

    public abstract class Cromosoma
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class Chromosome that defines a generalization of CromosomaBinario & CromosomaEntero
    Author:
    Manuel Chica Serrano

      • initRand

        public abstract void initRand()
        random initialization of a chromosome

      • initPlantilla

        public abstract void initPlantilla(Cromosoma crPlantilla,
                                   double ratio)
        this method is used in CHC method. initializes a chromosome using a chromosome template and a random initialization
        Parameters:
        crPlantilla - is a chromosome template
        ratio - is the ratio of random initialization

      • devolverGen

        public abstract int devolverGen(int i)
        return the ith gen of chromosome
        Parameters:
        i - is the ith position
        Returns:
        integer with gene value

      • cambiarGen

        public abstract void cambiarGen(int nuevoValorGen,
                                int posGen)
        modifies the ith value of a gene
        Parameters:
        nuevoValorGen - the new value for the gene
        posGen - the position what we want to change (0..tamCromsoma-1)

      • cruzar

        public abstract void cruzar(Cromosoma padre2,
                            Cromosoma hijo1,
                            Cromosoma hijo2)
        crossover operator. The offsprings must be created before calling method
        Parameters:
        padre2 - is a parent
        hijo1 - is the first offspring
        hijo2 - is the second offspring

      • cruzarHUX

        public abstract boolean cruzarHUX(Cromosoma padre2,
                                  Cromosoma hijo1,
                                  Cromosoma hijo2,
                                  int umbral)
        uniform crossover operator (HUX) If parents are very similar, the crossover operator doesn't apply
        Parameters:
        padre2 - is a parent
        hijo1 - is the first offspring
        hijo2 - is the second offspring
        umbral - is the threshold, needed by the operator
        Returns:
        return true is the crossover operator was succesful, false in other case

      • mutar

        public abstract void mutar()
        mutation operator

      • print

        public abstract java.lang.String print()
        it prints a chromosome, gene by gene.
        Returns:
        String representation of the chromosome.

      • devolverFeaturesVector

        public abstract boolean[] devolverFeaturesVector()
        returns a boolean array needed for Leaving One Out, Cross Validation and other methods used in Feature Selection Algorithm
        Returns:
        a boolean array with the selected features

      • setFitness

        public void setFitness(double calidad)
        set the fitness for the chromosome
        Parameters:
        calidad - this is the fitness to be applied

        public double getFitness()
        return the fitness of the chromosome
        Returns:

      • isEqual

        public boolean isEqual(Cromosoma cr)
        this boolean method return true if two chromosomes are equal in all of its genes
        Parameters:
        cr - is the other chromosome to compare
        Returns:
        true if two chromosomes are equal in all of their genes

        public void copy(Cromosoma cr)

        Parameters:
